attributes.action: Hand Over the Reigns to Jeremy Clarkson to be the Next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy Clarkson; motorists' best friend, tormentor of the loony left and the environmentalists' mother-in-law for PM. 
Clarkson is the only public figure who openly ridicules government policy for the utter farce that the majority of it is, slaps political correctness round the face and tweaks the nose of those who are allowing our once great nation to go to the dogs and therefore we believe that he should be handed a term in office to put things straight.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
